line1.description: Creates file for creating new table data for database in App/Database/Tables/
line1.option: --seed: with --seed option creates seed data for table [table-name] in App/Database/Seed/

line2.description: Migrates all tables to active database (if table not exists) (in localhost - for development)

line3.description: Migrates seed data for all tables in App/Database/Seed/
